TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SendMailErrorEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为控件（如 控件、 控件和 控件）的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of controls such as the control, the control, and the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含由 SMTP 邮件提供商不能由发送一封电子邮件时引发的错误消息控件，或控件。The object contains an error message that is raised by the SMTP mail provider when an email message cannot be sent by the control, or the control. 在这种情况下，对象发送到。In such a case, the object is sent to the . 创建要处理的事件委托。Create a delegate to handle the event. 处理事件允许 Web 应用程序继续运行，即使发生了异常。Handling the event allows your Web application to continue to run even though an exception has occurred. 这可不是关键发送一封电子邮件。This is useful when it is not critical to send an email message. 例如，如果用户使用通过多步骤向导时，会发生异常，它可以是记录错误、 信息性消息显示给用户，并允许用户以完成向导更有利。For example, if the exception occurs when a user is working through a multi-step wizard, it can be advantageous to log the error, display an informative message to the user, and allow the user to complete the wizard. 检查属性来确定异常的实际原因。Examine the property to determine the actual cause of the exception. 异常的最常见原因是存在配置错误[ <smtp>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)的计算机配置文件。The most common reason for the exception is a configuration error in the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md) of the machine configuration file. 尽管错误喜欢这通常在开发过程中发现和调试应用程序的邮件服务器会发生意外故障在生产环境中，并必须确定是要整个应用程序在这种情况下失败。Although an error like this is typically discovered during the development and debugging of an application, mail servers can fail unexpectedly in a production environment, and you must determine whether you want the entire application to fail in that situation. 如果没有，处理事件允许应用程序以继续。If not, handling the event allows your application to proceed. 必须设置属性设置为`true`发出信号，异常已处理; 否则为异常将被重新引发，并将包含原始调用堆栈和错误消息。You must set the property to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is rethrown, and will include the original call stack and error message. 如果你没有创建的事件处理程序事件，或如果您创建一个事件处理程序，但也会留下属性设置为`false`，Web 应用程序将停止运行出错时发送电子邮件时，ASP.NET 将显示一条错误消息。If you do not create an event handler for the event, or if you create an event handler but leave the property set to `false`, your Web application will stop running if an error occurs when sending an email message, and ASP.NET will display an error message. 方法还允许派生的类可以处理的事件，而不是由完成此。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event, instead of this being done by the . 这是用于处理由派生类中的事件的首选的技术或。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a class that is derived from or . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about handling events, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为 SendMailError 事件。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named SendMailError. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类以启用注册的委托接收事件的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class to enable registered delegates to receive the event.

summary.span: 当无法发送电子邮件时返回由 SMTP 邮件服务引发的异常。

span.span: Returns the exception thrown by an SMTP mail service when an email message cannot be sent.

value.span: 包含此异常的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含不能由发送一封电子邮件时由 SMTP 邮件提供程序引发的异常控制或。The property contains the exception that is thrown by the SMTP mail provider when an email message cannot be sent by the control or the . 此异常的最常见原因是存在配置错误[ <smtp>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)的计算机配置文件，它将生成以下异常消息： `The transport failed to connect to the server.`The most common reason for this exception is a configuration error in the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md) of the machine configuration file, which produces the following exception message: `The transport failed to connect to the server.` 如果没有错误电子邮件中嵌入内容文件使用时，不会引发异常。Exceptions are not thrown if there is an error in the email message when embedding a file using . 相反，嵌入的文件会显示已损坏，查看邮件消息时。Instead, the embedded file appears broken when the mail message is viewed. 必须设置作为传递的对象`e`的参数到`true`发出信号，异常已处理; 否则为异常将被重新引发，并包括原始调用堆栈和错误消息。You must set the object, passed as the `e` parameter of , to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is rethrown, and includes the original call stack and error message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendMailError`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendMailError`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示包含在 属性中的 SMTP 异常是否已经得到处理。

span.span: Indicates if the SMTP exception that is contained in the property has been handled.

value.span: 如果为 ，则此异常已被 委托使用并得到处理。

span.span: If , the exception is consumed and handled by the delegate.

value.span: 如果为 ，则再次引发异常，包含原来的调用堆栈和错误信息。

span.span: If , the exception is rethrown, including the original call stack and error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示如果已得到处理。The property indicates if the has been handled. 不能由发送一封电子邮件时，SMTP 邮件提供商将引发异常控件或。The exception is raised by the SMTP mail provider when an email message cannot be sent by the control or the . 异常的最常见原因是存在配置错误[ <smtp>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)的计算机配置文件。The most common reason for the exception is a configuration error in the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md) of the machine configuration file. 尽管错误喜欢这通常在开发过程中发现和调试应用程序的邮件服务器会发生意外故障在生产环境中，并必须确定是要整个应用程序在这种情况下失败。Although an error like this is typically discovered during the development and debugging of an application, mail servers can fail unexpectedly in a production environment, and you must determine whether you want the entire application to fail in that situation. 如果没有，处理事件允许应用程序以继续。If not, handling the event allows your application to proceed. 如果你没有创建的事件处理程序事件，或如果您创建一个事件处理程序，但也会留下属性设置为`false`，Web 应用程序将停止运行出错时发送电子邮件时，ASP.NET 将显示一条错误消息。If you do not create an event handler for the event, or if you create an event handler but leave the property set to `false`, your Web application will stop running if an error occurs when sending an email message, and ASP.NET will display an error message. 处理事件允许 Web 应用程序继续运行，即使发生了异常。Handling the event allows your Web application to continue to run even though an exception has occurred. 这可不是关键发送一封电子邮件。This is useful when it is not critical to send an email message. 例如，如果用户使用通过多步骤向导时，会发生异常，它可以是记录错误、 信息性消息显示给用户，并允许用户以完成向导更有利。For example, if the exception occurs when a user is working through a multi-step wizard, it can be advantageous to log the error, display an informative message to the user, and allow the user to complete the wizard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendMailError`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendMailError`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)]
